meanings.definition: The quality or state of being overt.
meanings.sent1: Her overtnesses in expressing her feelings made everyone understand her clearly.
meanings.sent2: The overtnesses of his actions left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: The overtnesses of the clown's performance brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The overtnesses of the sunrise painted the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The overtnesses of the teacher's instructions helped the students learn effectively.

meanings.sent1: The overtnesses of his confession surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her overtnesses in confronting the issue head-on were admirable.
meanings.sent3: The overtnesses of the cat's attempt to catch the mouse were comical.
meanings.sent4: The overtnesses of the storm's arrival caught us off guard.
meanings.sent5: The overtnesses of the singer's emotions resonated with the audience.
